title: Carpet Class Wool Consumption, Scoured Basis for United States
notes:
Source: Data For 1918-1919: Census, Raw Wool Consumption Report, Supplements For March And September 1935. Data For 1920-1940: Textile Economics Bureau, Organon, Special Supplement, January 21, 1941, P. 27. Data For 1941-1953: Rayon Organon, February Issues.

This NBER data series m01173 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01173
